extendedInfo.description: The hottest things to do, see and taste in your city just got a lot more... mobile. BuyWithMe Mobile lets you get notified when deals launch, buy with one click, and redeem straight from your phone. See what else we have in store:â¢ Be in-the-know with daily notifications for your cityâ¢ Map it to find deals near you... literallyâ¢ Filter and search for deals by categoryâ¢ Buy with ease in just one click using a stored credit cardâ¢ Go green with paperless voucher redemptionâ¢ Get social and share deals with BuyWithThreeDeals are currently available in 13 cities, including:â¢ Austinâ¢ Bostonâ¢ Chicagoâ¢ Dallasâ¢ Houstonâ¢ Los Angelesâ¢ New York Cityâ¢ Philadelphiaâ¢ Phoenixâ¢ San Diegoâ¢ San Franciscoâ¢ Seattleâ¢ Washington DC

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: Noticed that since Gilt took over buywithme, app doesn\'t work well. Deals show up but if you try to open any, it force closes. Will uninstall now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app flat out doesn\'t work,  just closes every time I try to see my deals
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I have not been able to open or use this program for days!! Place fix. I would give it a 5 IF it was working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wow
reviews.comment: wow, i had $10  credit but they closed down. so basically stole from me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cant see my vouchers
reviews.comment: then foreclose  worked before, but stopped about a month ago.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to work, now doesn\'t
reviews.comment: This app used to be great, and now cannot even open on DROID phones.  Inexcusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thumbs way down SUPER FAIL
reviews.comment: Buy with me was bought out by \"the gilt group\" Now my app does not work, my purchased deals are GONE from my app, and the new app doesnt even work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Since they merged with Gilt the application hasn\'t worked. Crashes upon open.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I only get error messages when I try to open it or click on a deal. Completely useless

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Use to work until the merger, now all I get is a connection error when I try to log on.

reviews.title: Gilt City Deals = BuyWithMe
reviews.comment: The app is great, but it\'s been Force Closing ever since Gilt City bought BuyWithMe. PLEASE update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close :(
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t worked for days...super irritating.  Going to print my vouchers from my PC and delete this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: constant force close
reviews.comment: this app used to be great but I haven\'t been able to check any deals for awhile now because of the constant force closes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t open deals
reviews.comment: Use to work great, now force closes everytime I click on a deal or want to view my vouchers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Booo
reviews.comment: It used to work great before merge with gilt, continuously force closes! I\'m  uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer usable
reviews.comment: App refuses to connect with server since Gilt bought them out. I expect this is Gilts way of destroying their competition -  buy them out to kill them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to work great, but hasn\'t worked all week
reviews.comment: This used to be the best of all of the daily deal apps.  But now it just hangs or crashes.  It is completely useless now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked once to use voucher at place, keeps forceclosing. Frustrating. Evo 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gilt screwed it up or a discruntal former employee, lol
reviews.comment: used to work great, no w all the force closes it became so bad, to the point of useless - lets get it together and fix it, then i will give a 5 star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App is broken
reviews.comment: App always force closes, sent an email to gilt about the error, they said I needed to purchase their app but failed to give me a link.
